form.student.setup_step_1_description: UDOIT Student View uses your institution's global JavaScript to create a more accessible experience for students who need to view and create alternate versions of files in Canvas.
form.student.setup_step_1_instruction: Download files if your institution does not have existing JavaScript files. Otherwise use the combine option to manually merge the content.
form.student.setup_step_2: Step 2: Add Files to Theme Editor
form.student.setup_step_2_part_1: Go to your institution's Instructure website, log in, click on Account -> Themes, and then select the theme you want to add.
form.student.setup_step_2_part_2: Select the Desktop JavaScript and add the downloaded JavaScript-code.js file
